Location:
- Indoor utility area â€“ furnace/air handler cabinet (electrical air handler)

Observations:
- Metal cabinet with wiring diagram/label attached
- Front panel appears in place; surface mildly dusty
- No visible rust, corrosion, leaks, or damaged wiring

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Schedule routine HVAC maintenance with a licensed tech
- Confirm panel screws/fasteners stay secure; keep area clear around the unit
- Verify condensate drain and electrical connections during service
